Trade/Device Name(s): Dimension® Mycophenolic Acid Flex® Reagent Cartridge
Method(s)/Technology(ies): Homogenous particle enhanced turbidimetric inhibition immunoassay (PETINIA)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Dimension Mycophenolic Acid Flex reagent cartridge and calibrator for quantitative measurement and calibration of mycophenolic acid on the Dimension Clinical Chemistry System.
Indications for Use Summary: Quantitative measurement of mycophenolic acid in human plasma and serum as an aid in management of therapy in renal, hepatic, and cardiac transplant patients; calibrator used to calibrate the assay on the Dimension system.
